translated: And still others say, ‚ÄúI myself speak this way.‚Äù

original: de gnyis bye brag brtags par gyis //
analyzed: de gnyis bye brag brtags par gyis //
translated: Examine the difference between these two.

original: thams cad la rung don gcig gi //
analyzed: thams cad la rung don gcig gi //
translated: In all cases, the meaning is one,

original: gsal byed nges pa gang la yin //
analyzed: gsal byed nges pa gang la yin //
translated: But the specification is different.

original: brjod 'dod rjod byed ma gtogs pas //
analyzed: brjod 'dod rjod byed ma gtogs pas //
translated: Except for the desire to express and the means of expression,

original: gang gis dbang po las 'das shes //
analyzed: gang gis dbang po las 'das shes //
translated: How can one know what is beyond the senses?

original: brjod 'dod nges pa'i rgyu yin zhing //
analyzed: brjod 'dod nges pa'i rgyu yin zhing //
translated: The desire to express is the cause of certainty,

original: brda ni de yi gsal byed yin //
analyzed: brda ni de yi gsal byed yin //
translated: And the convention is the means of making it known.

original: de ni skye min la med na //
analyzed: de ni skye min la med na //
translated: If it is not produced, it does not exist.

original: de don gcig can de gang las //
analyzed: de don gcig can de gang las //
translated: How can it have the same referent?

original: ngo bo nyid kyis nges na des //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis nges na des //
translated: If it is certain by its very nature,

original: gzhan du sbyor ba'ang med 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: gzhan du sbyor ba'ang med 'gyur zhing //
translated: Then it cannot be applied to anything else,

original: brda yang don med 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: brda yang don med 'gyur ba yin //
translated: And the convention would be meaningless.

original: gsal na'ang nges pa gang las yin //
analyzed: gsal na'ang nges pa gang las yin //
translated: If it is clear, how can it be certain?

original: gang la 'dod pas rang rgyud pa //
analyzed: gang la 'dod pas rang rgyud pa //
translated: If it is a matter of what one wants,

original: de las nges pa zhes bya gang //
analyzed: de las nges pa zhes bya gang //
translated: How can it be called certain?

original: des na 'di la mi 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: des na 'di la mi 'dod pa'i //
translated: Therefore, even what is not accepted

original: rung ba nyid kyang gsal byed 'gyur //
analyzed: rung ba nyid kyang gsal byed 'gyur //
translated: Is made clear by the convention.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the middle.

original: phyogs gcig la mi slu bas kyang lung gi mtshan nyid smra'o //
analyzed: phyogs gcig la mi slu bas kyang lung gi mtshan nyid smra'o //
translated: Some say that the definition of scripture is that it is non-deceptive with regard to one part.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ma mthong ba tsam gyis mi 'khrul ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir de'i don ni ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ma mthong ba tsam gyis mi 'khrul ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir de'i don ni ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: But non-deceptiveness is not established merely by not seeing what is contrary, so the meaning is uncertain.

original: gal te sbyong ba'i @177a * //
analyzed: gal te sbyong ba'i @177a * //
translated: If you say that the force of training

original: shugs nyid sgra thams cad ni don dang 'brel par grub pa yin te /
analyzed: shugs nyid sgra thams cad ni don dang 'brel par grub pa yin te /
translated: establishes the connection between all words and their meanings,

original: yul med na mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: yul med na mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because they are not connected in the absence of an object,

original: de ltar rigs mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar rigs mod kyi /
translated: that is reasonable.

original: 'on kyang de lta bu nyid rab tu 'grub kyang 'dod pa 'dogs pa med pas 'jig rten na gzhan du tha snyad byed pa mthong ba'i phyir the tshom za ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de lta bu nyid rab tu 'grub kyang 'dod pa 'dogs pa med pas 'jig rten na gzhan du tha snyad byed pa mthong ba'i phyir the tshom za ba nyid do //
translated: However, even if that is established, because there is no designation of what is desired, there is doubt, because in the world one sees the use of other terms.

original: de'i phyir lung log kyang don med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lung log kyang don med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if scripture is rejected, it is not understood to be meaningless.

original: mngon sum log pa'i mi dmigs pa nyid dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum log pa'i mi dmigs pa nyid dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: The non-apprehension of the negation of perception establishes the non-existence of things,

original: don yod na rgyu ma tshang ba med pa de med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don yod na rgyu ma tshang ba med pa de med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the object exists, its non-existence is impossible without the incompleteness of the cause.

original: de la tshu rol mthong ba bdag nyid kyi mngon sum log pa tshad mar byed pa ni /
analyzed: de la tshu rol mthong ba bdag nyid kyi mngon sum log pa tshad mar byed pa ni /
translated: In that regard, the negation of perception, which is the self-nature of seeing a limited extent, is made valid.

original: des gzung bar 'os pa nyid dgag par rigs kyi thams cad ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'gog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des gzung bar 'os pa nyid dgag par rigs kyi thams cad ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'gog pa ma yin no //
translated: It is proper to refute the suitability of apprehension, but not everything, because not all is like that.

original: 'jug pa blo sngon can nyid phyir //
analyzed: 'jug pa blo sngon can nyid phyir //
translated: Because the operation of the mind is preceded by that,

original: de ni me 'jug 'bras can 'dod //
analyzed: de ni me 'jug 'bras can 'dod //
translated: it is considered to have the result of the operation of fire.

original: bskal ba'i yul la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med pa de ni yod pa'i shes pa dang / sgra dang / tha snyad 'gog pa'i 'bras bu can yin te /
analyzed: bskal ba'i yul la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med pa de ni yod pa'i shes pa dang / sgra dang / tha snyad 'gog pa'i 'bras bu can yin te /
translated: That nonapprehension, which is in regard to a nonexistent object, has the result of the cessation of the cognition, the word, and the convention of existence.

original: de dag ni dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are preceded by the apprehension of an object.

original: gzhan ni 'jug pa'i 'bras can te //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'jug pa'i 'bras can te //
translated: The other has the result of operation,

original: de ni rgyu mtshan mthong phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rgyu mtshan mthong phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is seen.

original: mi dmigs pa snga ma ni med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can yang yin te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa snga ma ni med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can yang yin te /
translated: The former nonapprehension has the result of the cessation of the cognition, the word, and the convention of nonexistence.

original: yul rab tu bstan pas rab tu grub pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul rab tu bstan pas rab tu grub pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it establishes the convention of the proof of the demonstration of the object.

original: mi dmigs pa 'di gnyis ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa 'di gnyis ni /
translated: These two nonapprehensionsüîΩare the nonapprehension of the object and the nonapprehension of the reason.

original: rang ldog pa'i rgyu med pa dang / yod pa dag gis yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du ni 'dra ste /
analyzed: rang ldog pa'i rgyu med pa dang / yod pa dag gis yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du ni 'dra ste /
translated: and the non-existent and the existent are similar in that they both have the effect of negating the term existent.

original: gcig la the tshom za ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: gcig la the tshom za ba'i phyir la /
translated: Because there is doubt about one,

original: gzhan la ni log pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ni log pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because there is error about the other.

original: de la gnyis pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa la nye bar mkho ba'i phyir tshad mar bshad kyi /
analyzed: de la gnyis pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa la nye bar mkho ba'i phyir tshad mar bshad kyi /
translated: The second is explained as a means of valid knowledge because it is necessary for negating the term existent.

original: ldog pa mthong ba la sogs pa la nye bar sbyor ba ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: ldog pa mthong ba la sogs pa la nye bar sbyor ba ni ma yin te ;
translated: But it is not applied to seeing the counter-correlate, etc.

original: / the tshom za ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: / the tshom za ba'i phyir te /
translated: because there is doubt.

original: shes par byed pa'i yan lag ma nges pa las ni ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i yan lag ma nges pa las ni ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no understanding from an uncertain part of the means of knowing.

original: dang po ni de la tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: dang po ni de la tshad ma yin te /
translated: The first is a means of valid knowledge in regard to that,

original: nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde yod tsam dang rjes 'brel can //üîΩbdag nyid gtan tshigs rang bzhin yin//
analyzed: nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro // de yod tsam dang rjes 'brel can // bdag nyid gtan tshigs rang bzhin yin//
translated: because it has a certain effect.üîΩIt is only the mere presence of that,üîΩand the nature of the reason is connected with that.

original: @177b 'di ltar don gyi de'i bdag nyid ni de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa can kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: @177b 'di ltar don gyi de'i bdag nyid ni de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa can kho na yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the mere presence of that is only connected with the nature of the object.

original: gzhan la rag las pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la rag las pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not dependent on another,

original: de yod na yod par ma gyur pa phyis 'byung ba ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na yod par ma gyur pa phyis 'byung ba ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory that what did not exist when it existed would later arise as its own nature.

original: rgyu rnams kyang 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyang 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because causes are not confused with regard to their effects.

original: de'i phyir de yod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dro bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dro bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of fire is to be hot, which is only related to its existence.

original: de yang gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar 'god pa na /
analyzed: de yang gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar 'god pa na /
translated: And when that is being stated as the reason,üîΩit is stated as the reason with the qualifications of

original: khyad par ltos dang dag pa ste //
analyzed: khyad par ltos dang dag pa ste //
translated: dependence, purity,

original: 'jig la 'bras dang yod nyid bzhin //
analyzed: 'jig la 'bras dang yod nyid bzhin //
translated: and existence, like the effect of destruction.

original: nye bar 'god pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar 'god pa yin no //
translated: It is stated as the reason with those four qualifications.

original: rang gi ngo bo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi byed pa la nye bar ltos pa'i dngos po ni byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi byed pa la nye bar ltos pa'i dngos po ni byas pa yin no //
translated: A thing that is dependent on the activity of another in order to establish its own nature is a product.

original: des na byas pa'i sgra 'di ni rang gi ngo bo brjod pa yin yang khyad par gzhan de dag 'phen par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na byas pa'i sgra 'di ni rang gi ngo bo brjod pa yin yang khyad par gzhan de dag 'phen par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, although the word ‚Äúproduct‚Äù expresses its own nature, it also implies those other qualifications.

original: 'dis ni rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid can la sogs pa yang bshad pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'dis ni rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid can la sogs pa yang bshad pa yin no ;
translated: This also explains the difference in terms of the specific conditions.

original: / de ltar kha cig tu ni khyad par la ltos nas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod la /
analyzed: / de ltar kha cig tu ni khyad par la ltos nas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod la /
translated: Thus, in some cases, a reason based on the nature of things is stated in dependence on a distinction.

original: kha cig tu ni ma ltos par te /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni ma ltos par te /
translated: In some cases, it is not dependent.

original: dper na mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the existence of impermanence.

original: kha cig tu ni rang bzhin du gyur pa'i chos yongs su bzung nas te /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni rang bzhin du gyur pa'i chos yongs su bzung nas te /
translated: In some cases, a reason based on the nature of things is stated by taking up a property that is a nature.

original: dper na de nyid las skyes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na de nyid las skyes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the production of that very thing.

original: phyogs 'dis gzhan du yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dbye ba blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis gzhan du yang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dbye ba blta bar bya'o //
translated: By this method, one should see the divisions of reasons based on the nature of things in other cases as well.

original: rang bzhin de yang gal te rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis khyab pa tshad mas nges pa ni de'i tshe go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin de yang gal te rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis khyab pa tshad mas nges pa ni de'i tshe go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, if the nature of a thing is ascertained by valid cognition to pervade its own probandum property, then it is an indicator.

original: khyab pa'am chos can la brten pa ma nges na de'i rang bzhin gyis go bar bya ba /üîΩgo bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyab pa'am chos can la brten pa ma nges na de'i rang bzhin gyis go bar bya ba /üîΩgo bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If the pervasion or the property possessor is not ascertained, then its nature is not an indicator.

original: gsal ba nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma ni de'i rang bzhin ma rtogs na rang gi don bya ba mi byed do //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma ni de'i rang bzhin ma rtogs na rang gi don bya ba mi byed do //
translated: The lamp which illuminates by its own clarity does not perform its own function if its nature is not realized.

original: de'i phyir nges pa nyid kyis khyab par bya ba ni go bar byed pa yin la ;
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa nyid kyis khyab par bya ba ni go bar byed pa yin la ;
translated: Therefore, the pervaded is that which is to be understood by the pervader,

original: khyab par byed pa ni go bar bya ba yin no //üîΩkhyab par byed pa'i chos de ni rang log pa na khyab par bya ba de ldog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa ni go bar bya ba yin no // khyab par byed pa'i chos de ni rang log pa na khyab par bya ba de ldog par byed pa yin no //
translated: and the pervader is that which is to be understood by the pervaded.üîΩWhen the pervading property is reversed, the pervaded is also reversed.

original: gal te 'di med na byed pa yin na de lta na 'di de'i khyab par byed pa grub pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir 'dis ni gtan @178a * //
analyzed: gal te 'di med na byed pa yin na de lta na 'di de'i khyab par byed pa grub pa yin no // de'i phyir 'dis ni gtan @178a * //
translated: If it is the case that the pervader is the agent of the pervaded, then in that case the pervader is established as the pervaded.

original: tshigs rnam pa gnyis kyis go bar bya ba dang / go bar byed pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshigs rnam pa gnyis kyis go bar bya ba dang / go bar byed pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, by this, the definition of that which is to be understood and that which is the means of understanding should be understood to be explained by the two types of reason.

original: sbyor ba'i dbang gis gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dbang gis gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: By the power of application, the reason is of two types:

original: chos mthun pa nyid can dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid can no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can dang / chos mi mthun pa nyid can no //
translated: having the same property and having a different property.

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag ma gtogs par 'di gnyis don du ni bye brag ci yang med do //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag ma gtogs par 'di gnyis don du ni bye brag ci yang med do //
translated: Except for the difference in the application, there is no difference in the meaning of these two.

original: de mthong ba las rang nyid rtogs pa na yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de mthong ba las rang nyid rtogs pa na yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Because when one understands it by seeing it, it is just like that.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang dbye ba bstan to //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang dbye ba bstan to //
translated: The division of inference for oneself has been taught.

original: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba la yang don gyis chos mi mthun pa nyid rtogs te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba la yang don gyis chos mi mthun pa nyid rtogs te /
translated: In the application of similarity, one understands the meaning of dissimilarity,

original: de med na bsgrub par bya bas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na bsgrub par bya bas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it does not exist, the probandum does not follow from the reason.

original: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa la yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa la yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs te /
translated: Similarly, in the application of dissimilarity, one understands the pervasion,

original: de med na bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med na bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: because if it does not exist, one doubts that the reason does not exist in the absence of the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs de dag kyang gang cung zad byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de dag kyang gang cung zad byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: Those reasons are: Whatever is produced is impermanent,

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a pot, for example.

original: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba can no //
analyzed: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba can no //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúSound is also produced‚Äù is the positive concomitance.

original: 'dir shugs kyis sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dir shugs kyis sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Here, the meaning is that sound is impermanent, and this is understood by implication.

original: des na phyogs ni gdon mi za bar bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des na phyogs ni gdon mi za bar bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the subject must not be stated.

original: ldog pa can yang mi rtag pa nyid med na byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na sgra ni byas pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ldog pa can yang mi rtag pa nyid med na byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na sgra ni byas pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The negative concomitance is that if impermanence did not exist, production would not exist, and yet sound is produced.

original: de'i ngo bor gyur pa nyid kyis na byas pa de med na med pa nyid dang / sgra la yang yod par bstan pa na dngos po de'i bdag nyid du yod pa yin no zhes shugs kyis 'grub pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba ma brjod do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor gyur pa nyid kyis na byas pa de med na med pa nyid dang / sgra la yang yod par bstan pa na dngos po de'i bdag nyid du yod pa yin no zhes shugs kyis 'grub pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba ma brjod do //
translated: Since it is established by implication that sound exists as the nature of that thing, production, because it is established that production does not exist without impermanence and exists in sound, the object to be inferred is not stated.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yang don gyis go bas 'grub ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yang don gyis go bas 'grub ste /
translated: The positive concomitance is also established by implication.

original: 'di ltar de'i bdag nyid du ma nges pa ni de log pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i bdag nyid du ma nges pa ni de log pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, that which is not ascertained to be the nature of that thing will not be reversed when that thing is reversed.

original: des na nges pa rab tu bsgrubs nas ldog pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: des na nges pa rab tu bsgrubs nas ldog pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, having established the positive concomitance, the negative concomitance should be stated.

original: da ni gang gis de skad du brjod par 'gyur ba byas pa gdon mi za bar mi rtag pa'o zhes ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: da ni gang gis de skad du brjod par 'gyur ba byas pa gdon mi za bar mi rtag pa'o zhes ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
translated: Now, how can one explain that what is called ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù is necessarily that which is produced?

original: 'di ltar rgyu med phyir na 'jig pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu med phyir na 'jig pa ni /
translated: Because of the absence of a cause, destructionüîΩis not a thing.

original: rang gi ngo bos rjes dngos po 'jig pa de'i ngo bo rgyu las ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos rjes dngos po 'jig pa de'i ngo bo rgyu las ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of the destruction of a thing does not depend on a cause,

original: rang gi rgyu kho na @178b las 'jig pa'i dang can du 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu kho na @178b las 'jig pa'i dang can du 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it occurs only from its own cause.

original: de bas na gang cung zad byas pa de ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i ngang can yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gang cung zad byas pa de ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i ngang can yin no //
translated: Therefore, whatever is produced is by nature subject to destruction.üîΩAs it is said:

original: ji ltar / ltos dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: ji ltar / ltos dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: Things that are dependent

original: nges par 'gyur ba med par mthong //
analyzed: nges par 'gyur ba med par mthong //
translated: are seen to be definitely impermanent.

original: dngos po 'jig pa ni ltos pa med pa yin te ;
analyzed: dngos po 'jig pa ni ltos pa med pa yin te ;
translated: The destruction of a thing is not dependent on anything else,

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na bum pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rtag par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na bum pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rtag par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: because if it were dependent, some things such as pots would be permanent.

original: gal te 'jig pa rgyu mang po yod kyang de dag kyang rang gi rkyen la rag las nas nye ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'jig pa rgyu mang po yod kyang de dag kyang rang gi rkyen la rag las nas nye ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If destruction has many causes, and those causes are dependent on their own conditions, then destruction would not occur without cause.

original: gdon mi za bar nye ba ma yin pas 'ga' zhig mi 'jig par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar nye ba ma yin pas 'ga' zhig mi 'jig par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: But if destruction is not dependent on its own cause, then it would not occur even when its cause is present.

original: rgyu rnams ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: Causes do not necessarily possess their effects,

original: ma tshang ba dang gegs byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma tshang ba dang gegs byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because incompleteness and obstruction are possible.

original: des na 'bras bu gnas med phyir //üîΩ'jig pa rgyu ldan smra rnams kyi //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu gnas med phyir // 'jig pa rgyu ldan smra rnams kyi //
translated: Therefore, because the effect has no location,üîΩthose who assert that destruction has a causeüîΩhave explained all causes of destruction

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu ni thams cad dag /'khrul pa nyid du bshad pa yin //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu ni thams cad dag /'khrul pa nyid du bshad pa yin //
translated: as being just errors.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.

original: de'i phyir dngos po de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba gzhan la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba gzhan la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, that which is not dependent on another for its transformation into that thing is ascertained as having that nature.

original: rgyu tshogs pa tha mas rang gi 'bres bu bskyed pa la gegs byed pa mi srid pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa tha mas rang gi 'bres bu bskyed pa la gegs byed pa mi srid pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the final collection of causes does not have the power to generate its effect, because it is impossible for it to be obstructed.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba la ltos pa med du zin kyang /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba la ltos pa med du zin kyang /
translated: Even if it is the case that something does not depend on becoming something else,

original: de'i ngo bor ma nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'i ngo bor ma nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the case that its nature is not ascertained?

original: sa dang sa bon dang chu'i tshogs pa dag kyang res 'ga' myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: sa dang sa bon dang chu'i tshogs pa dag kyang res 'ga' myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: A collection of earth, seeds, and water sometimes produces a sprout.

original: der yang rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because that also depends on the transformation of the cause.

original: de ltar dngos po ni 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po ni 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, no entity depends on anything else.

original: de la yang rgyu tshogs pa tha mas 'bras bu bskyed pa la bar du chod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la yang rgyu tshogs pa tha mas 'bras bu bskyed pa la bar du chod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: In that case, the final collection of causes that produces the effect without obstruction possesses the effect.

original: de la myu gu'i rgyu ni de nyid yin la /
analyzed: de la myu gu'i rgyu ni de nyid yin la /
translated: In that case, the cause of the sprout is just that,

original: yongs su 'gyur ba snga ma dag ni de'i don du yin no //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba snga ma dag ni de'i don du yin no //
translated: and the previous transformations are for that purpose.

original: der ni de la gegs byed par nus pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: der ni de la gegs byed par nus pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In that case, there is no power to obstruct it at all.

original: zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained many times.

original: gal te nas kyi sa bon la sogs pa yang s'a lu'i myu gu bskyed par bya ba la ltos pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te nas kyi sa bon la sogs pa yang s'a lu'i myu gu bskyed par bya ba la ltos pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that a barley seed, etc., is not independent with regard to the production of a rice sprout, etc.?

original: de skyed pa'i rkyen dag ni res 'ga' de la yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de skyed pa'i rkyen dag ni res 'ga' de la yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the conditions for its production sometimes approach it.

original: @179a * // ji ltar ltos pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: @179a * // ji ltar ltos pa med pa yin te /
translated: How is it not dependent?

original: gang gi phyir de dag la ni s'a lu'i sa bon gyi de skyed par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid med pa'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa yin no //üîΩde lta na ni 'o na byas pa'am yod pa 'ga' zhig la yang 'jig pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid med pas de'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag la ni s'a lu'i sa bon gyi de skyed par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid med pa'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa yin no // de lta na ni 'o na byas pa'am yod pa 'ga' zhig la yang 'jig pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid med pas de'i rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because they do not have the nature of producing a rice sprout, they are dependent on the nature of a rice seed.

original: 'jig pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if that is so, then nothing that is produced or exists has the nature of destruction, because it does not have the nature of nonexistence.üîΩTherefore, because it is dependent on its own nature, it is not destroyed.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang rang rang gi rgyu las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang rang rang gi rgyu las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But the nature of a rice seed, etc., is due to its own cause.

original: gang zhig de'i rgyu can ma yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig de'i rgyu can ma yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is not due to its cause does not have its nature.

original: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa de yang rang gi ngo bos rtog pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa de yang rang gi ngo bos rtog pa nyid do //
translated: The determination of the potency of the cause is also just a conceptual thought.

original: don rnams kyi rang bzhin nges pa yang glo bur bar ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: don rnams kyi rang bzhin nges pa yang glo bur bar ni mi rigs te /
translated: The determination of the nature of objects is also not reasonable as adventitious.

original: ltos pa med pa ni yul dang dus dang rdzas nges par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa ni yul dang dus dang rdzas nges par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that that which is independent is determined in terms of place, time, and substance.

original: de bzhin du 'di la yang gang gis 'di dag 'ga' zhig 'jig pa'i bdag nyid du skye bar 'gyur ba nges pa'i rgyu 'ga' zhig brjod dgos so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di la yang gang gis 'di dag 'ga' zhig 'jig pa'i bdag nyid du skye bar 'gyur ba nges pa'i rgyu 'ga' zhig brjod dgos so //
translated: In the same way, here it is necessary to state some cause that determines these to arise with the nature of destruction.

original: 'dir nges par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'dir nges par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Here there is no cause that determines at all.

original: skye ba can thams cad ni 'jig pa dang ldan par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba can thams cad ni 'jig pa dang ldan par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established that all that has arising has destruction.

original: gal te skye ba can gyi rang bzhin 'jig pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te skye ba can gyi rang bzhin 'jig pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the nature of that which has arising is to have destruction,

original: de'i skye ba ni 'jig pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i skye ba ni 'jig pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu ma yin la /
translated: its arising is not the cause of the nature of that which has destruction.

original: rgyu med pa la yang rang bzhin nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu med pa la yang rang bzhin nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that which lacks a cause does not have a determined nature.

original: de'i phyir 'di la rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par dbye ba 'ga' yang med la de med pa'i phyir 'bras bu la yang med pas mi mtshungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par dbye ba 'ga' yang med la de med pa'i phyir 'bras bu la yang med pas mi mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not similar, because there is no division of the nature of the cause in this case, and because the effect does not exist when that does not exist.

original: gal te tshogs pa las skye ba thams cad ni 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa las skye ba thams cad ni 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt is certain that all that arises from a collection perishes,‚Äù that is not certain,

original: de dag la ni ma lus par mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la ni ma lus par mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen that they are completely destroyed.

original: 'di ltar dngos po rnams kyi tshogs pa ni nus pa sna tshogs par mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po rnams kyi tshogs pa ni nus pa sna tshogs par mthong ste /
translated: Thus, the collection of things is seen to have various potencies.

original: de la 'ga' zhig mi 'jig pa'i bdag nyid du bskyed pa gang yin par yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'ga' zhig mi 'jig pa'i bdag nyid du bskyed pa gang yin par yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, it is possible that some things are produced with a nature that does not perish.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not possible.

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni don byed nus pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni don byed nus pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the characteristic of a thing is the ability to perform a function.

original: nus pa brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba ni nye bar brjod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: nus pa brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba ni nye bar brjod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: That which is devoid of all expressions of ability is characterized by the absence of expression.

original: 'o na ni mtha'i skad cig nye bar brjod pa med par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni mtha'i skad cig nye bar brjod pa med par thal lo zhe na /
translated: Well then, it follows that the final moment is inexpressible.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it does not follow.

original: sems can du bgrang ba'i skad cig gzhan @179b nye bar len pa med pa ni mtha'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can du bgrang ba'i skad cig gzhan @179b nye bar len pa med pa ni mtha'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the characteristic of the end is the absence of appropriation of another moment that is counted as a sentient being.

original: de yang tha na shes bya la khyab pa'i ye shes la ni gzugs med pa'i khams su yang nus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang tha na shes bya la khyab pa'i ye shes la ni gzugs med pa'i khams su yang nus pa nyid yin no //
translated: Moreover, in the end, it is possible even in the formless realm for the knowledge that pervades objects of knowledge.

original: khams gzhan du ni du ma la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams gzhan du ni du ma la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In other realms, it would be helpful for many.

original: sgrim pa med na mi nus par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgrim pa med na mi nus par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it would not be possible without effort,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: sgrim pa med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrim pa med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible that there is no effort.

original: chos gcig yongs su ma shes na gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa na bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gcig yongs su ma shes na gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa na bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one does not understand one thing, when one engages in the welfare of others, one will not understand what should and should not be done.

original: thams cad du the tshom skye ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: thams cad du the tshom skye ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because doubt arises in all cases,

original: 'ga' zhig tu ji zhig ltar nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu ji zhig ltar nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because in some cases it is necessary to know something.

original: de ma shes na de'i yan lag ma tshang bas na sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba med pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma shes na de'i yan lag ma tshang bas na sgrub par byed pa ma tshang ba med pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one does not know that, then because the branches are incomplete, it is not tenable that the proof is complete.

original: tha ma nus pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: tha ma nus pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that it is ultimately without the ability to perform a function,

original: 'ga' zhig byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it performs a function in some way.

original: mi byed kyang rkyen dang bral bas yin gyi /
analyzed: mi byed kyang rkyen dang bral bas yin gyi /
translated: Even if it does not perform a function, it is free from conditions.

original: ma bral na ni byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma bral na ni byed pa nyid do //
translated: If it were not free from conditions, it would perform a function.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: That which is not momentary is not like that,

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible in every way.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa de ni don byed par srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa de ni don byed par srid pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not momentary is not possible as a functional entity,

original: rim dang cig car 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim dang cig car 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory for it to be sequential and instantaneous.

original: rim gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rim gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not sequential,

original: ltos pa med par rang yod tsam gyis byed pa por gyur pa ni sdod par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med par rang yod tsam gyis byed pa por gyur pa ni sdod par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that it is an agent that exists merely through its own nature without depending on anything else.

original: sngar byed pa po ma yin pa ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngar byed pa po ma yin pa ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur te /
translated: That which is not an agent previously does not become one later,

original: rang gi ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its own nature does not change.

original: ltos pa yin na yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: ltos pa yin na yang bshad zin to //
translated: If it depends on something else, that has already been explained.

original: cig car byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: cig car byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not instantaneous,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni phyis kyang mi byed par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni phyis kyang mi byed par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that its own nature does not perform a function later.

original: des na nus pa thams cad ldog pa de ni yod pa'i mtshan nyid las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nus pa thams cad ldog pa de ni yod pa'i mtshan nyid las 'das pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cessation of all potentiality is beyond the definition of existence.

original: don byed nus pa gang yin pa de 'dir don dam yod pa yin /
analyzed: don byed nus pa gang yin pa de 'dir don dam yod pa yin /
translated: That which is able to perform a function is here said to be ultimately existent.üîΩThe verse says:

original: de la rim dang rim ma yin //
analyzed: de la rim dang rim ma yin //
translated: In sequence and non-sequence,

original: 'gal phyir skad cig ma yin med //
analyzed: 'gal phyir skad cig ma yin med //
translated: because of contradiction, there is no momentariness.

original: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is a summarizing verse.

original: yang na phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi byas pa mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: yang na phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi byas pa mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Or, there is no fault in establishing the impermanence of the conditioned characteristics of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la ni tshad ma med pas mi 'grub pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la ni tshad ma med pas mi 'grub pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not their nature, it is not established by valid cognition, so it is not tenable to establish concomitance.

original: kho bo cag gis byas pa ni de nyid yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis byas pa ni de nyid yin te /
translated: We say that is precisely what is done.

original: ji skad du chos mngon pa las 'dus byas gang zhe na /üîΩphung po lnga'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du chos mngon pa las 'dus byas gang zhe na / phung po lnga'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: As it is said in the Abhidharma: What is the conditioned?üîΩThe five aggregates.

original: de la dbang po lnga ni 'pho ba'i rang bzhin can yin te /
analyzed: de la dbang po lnga ni 'pho ba'i rang bzhin can yin te /
translated: Among them, the five sense faculties have the nature of transmigration.

original: de'i 'bras bu rnam par shes pa rnam @180a * //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu rnam par shes pa rnam @180a * //
translated: The result of that is consciousness.üîΩ

original: bar chad pa dang rnam par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar chad pa dang rnam par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the result, consciousness, is seen to be interrupted and to change.

original: de dag gi rang bzhin de nyid yin na ni de mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa yang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin de nyid yin na ni de mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa yang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If they were of the same nature as that, it would not be tenable, and reliance would be contradictory.

original: de bzhin du yul dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / mtshan ma nye bar rtogs pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang / yul la nye bar dmigs pa ni skye ba dang 'gag par so sor rig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yul dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / mtshan ma nye bar rtogs pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang / yul la nye bar dmigs pa ni skye ba dang 'gag par so sor rig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, the object, pleasure and pain, the apprehension of signs, attachment, etc., and the apprehension of the object are impermanent because they are known to arise and cease.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni rang gi rgyu'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i ngo bor sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni rang gi rgyu'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i ngo bor sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: Those that have such a nature are established as the nature of their own causes.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i skye ba can gzhan dag kyang rang gi ngo bo de la sbyor ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i skye ba can gzhan dag kyang rang gi ngo bo de la sbyor ba byed pa yin no //
translated: And those that have such a nature as arising are also applied to their own nature.

original: 'dis ni khams dang skye mched kyang bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni khams dang skye mched kyang bshad pa yin te /
translated: By this, the elements and sense bases are also explained.

original: chos kyi skye mched dang / khams kyang phung po gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched dang / khams kyang phung po gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: The sense-sphere of mental objects and the element of mental objects are also not contradictory, because they have the nature of three aggregates.

original: 'dis ni yod pa yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni yod pa yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This also explains the existence of the aggregates.

original: 'o na da ni 'jig pa ltos pa med pa la nus pa ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: 'o na da ni 'jig pa ltos pa med pa la nus pa ci zhig yod de /
translated: Now, what is the capability of destruction that is independent?

original: gang gi phyir phung po la sogs pa dag ni gtan tshigs pa gzhan kho nas mi rtag par grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phung po la sogs pa dag ni gtan tshigs pa gzhan kho nas mi rtag par grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the aggregates, etc., are established as impermanent by another reason.

original: 'ga' zhig mi rtag par grub kyang rnam pa de lta bu dag des khyab pa ni ltos pa med pa las yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig mi rtag par grub kyang rnam pa de lta bu dag des khyab pa ni ltos pa med pa las yin no //
translated: Even though some are established as impermanent, their pervasion by that is independent.

original: 'jig pa la rgyu yod pa nyid yin na ni 'ga' zhig pa ni gzhan la ltos pa med par rgyu pa rgyu ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig pa la rgyu yod pa nyid yin na ni 'ga' zhig pa ni gzhan la ltos pa med par rgyu pa rgyu ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If destruction itself has a cause, then some would be dependent on another, like a cause that is a cause.

original: skyes pa de'i ngo bo gzhan la ma tshang bas mi 'jig par pa med pa nyid 'dis ni 'jig pa 'ga' zhig la 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'gyur ba 'gal bas na de med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid du sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: skyes pa de'i ngo bo gzhan la ma tshang bas mi 'jig par pa med pa nyid 'dis ni 'jig pa 'ga' zhig la 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'gyur ba 'gal bas na de med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid du sgrub par byed do //
translated: Since it is contradictory for something to change at some time and not at some other time, this establishes that it does not have the nature of non-existence.

original: ltos pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni gal te res 'ga'am 'ga' zhig la 'gyur na ni dus dang rdzas de la ltos pa'i phyir ltos pa med pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni gal te res 'ga'am 'ga' zhig la 'gyur na ni dus dang rdzas de la ltos pa'i phyir ltos pa med pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: If that which has no dependence on anything else were to change at some time or other, then it would not be independent, because it would depend on time and substance.

original: /'o na ni 'jig pa'i rang gi ngo bo de ltos pa med pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: /'o na ni 'jig pa'i rang gi ngo bo de ltos pa med pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the nature of destruction does not depend on anything else, then it would be causeless.

original: rgyu med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not causeless.

original: yod pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid las de ltar skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid las de ltar skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it arises in that way from the state of being a cause that exists.

original: gal te yod pa ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig las 'byung ba ma gyin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yod pa ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig las 'byung ba ma gyin no zhe na /
translated: If that which exists does not arise from anything else,

original: 'o na ni yod pa glo bur ba yin pa'i phyir 'di 'ga' zhig gi tshe ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni yod pa glo bur ba yin pa'i phyir 'di 'ga' zhig gi tshe ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is not a permanent entity, then it would not be possible for it to be destroyed at some time, because its existence would be adventitious.

original: gang 'ga' zhig la nye bar brten pa'am ma yin pa de gang la cung zad 'brel pa'am ma yin te /
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig la nye bar brten pa'am ma yin pa de gang la cung zad 'brel pa'am ma yin te /
translated: And that which is dependent on something or not, is not related to anything at all.

original: gal te yod pa 'di 'brel pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te yod pa 'di 'brel pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If this existence were not related,

original: nges pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be ascertained.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni @180b 'ga' yang glo bur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni @180b 'ga' yang glo bur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not adventitious at all.

original: 'o na da ni 'jig pa rgyu med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na da ni 'jig pa rgyu med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can destruction be causeless?

original: skyes pa de'i ngo bo gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes pa de'i ngo bo gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature as arisen does not depend on another.

original: gzhan yang 'jig pa zhes bya ba dngos po las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'jig pa zhes bya ba dngos po las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
translated: Moreover, there is nothing called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù that is different from an entity.

original: dngos po nyid 'jig pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po nyid 'jig pa yin te /
translated: An entity itself is destruction.

original: de nyid skad cig mar gnas par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid skad cig mar gnas par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is, it is arisen as momentary.

original: gzhan pa rnams kyis 'di'i rang bzhin de phyis nges par 'gyur gyi sngar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa rnams kyis 'di'i rang bzhin de phyis nges par 'gyur gyi sngar ni ma yin te /
translated: Others will ascertain its nature later, but not previously.

original: mthong yang gsal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong yang gsal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even though it is seen, it is not clear.

original: des na phyis de'i dbang gis rnam par 'jog ste /
analyzed: des na phyis de'i dbang gis rnam par 'jog ste /
translated: Therefore, later it is posited by the power of that,

original: mi shes pa rnam par 'gyur ba mthong bas dug tu rnam par 'jog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi shes pa rnam par 'gyur ba mthong bas dug tu rnam par 'jog pa bzhin no //
translated: just as poison is posited by the transformation of ignorance when it is seen.

original: de bas na 'jig pa 'di ni yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa'i phyir de la khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'jig pa 'di ni yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa'i phyir de la khyab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since this destruction is not dependent on anything other than existence, it is pervaded by that.

original: yang ji ltar na 'jig pa ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na 'jig pa ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: But how is it to be understood that destruction is not dependent?

original: de rgyu nus pa med pa'i phyir yang /
analyzed: de rgyu nus pa med pa'i phyir yang /
translated: Because its cause is not possible.

original: yang gi sgras ni dngos po med pa byed pa'i bya ba bkag pa'i yang phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni dngos po med pa byed pa'i bya ba bkag pa'i yang phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that it is also because the activity that produces the nonthing is refuted.

original: ji ltar nus pa med ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar nus pa med ce na /
translated: How is it not possible?

original: dngos po grub na ni de rgyus byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po grub na ni de rgyus byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If the thing is established, it is not produced by its cause.

original: gzhan byed na de la cung zad kyang byas pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan byed na de la cung zad kyang byas pa med do //
translated: If it is produced by another, then it is not produced by that at all.

original: des na 'jig par byed pas gzhan byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'jig par byed pas gzhan byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is not produced by the producer of destruction, it is not produced by another.

original: des na 'di de dang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin mi byed pas na cung zad kyang mi byed pa ni ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di de dang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin mi byed pas na cung zad kyang mi byed pa ni ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it does not perform the nature of being this or not being this, it does not perform even the slightest function, and so it is not a basis of dependence.

original: ji ltar bya ba 'gog ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba 'gog ce na /
translated: How does one refute activity?

original: 'di ltar 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po med par gyur pa yin par sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po med par gyur pa yin par sems te /
translated: In this way, one thinks that what is called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù is the nonexistence of a thing.

original: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu 'di ni med par byed do //
analyzed: des na 'jig pa'i rgyu 'di ni med par byed do //
translated: Therefore, the cause of destruction makes it nonexistent.

original: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it would be said that ‚Äúit makes it nonexistent.‚Äù

original: de la gal te med pa zhes bya ba'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig 'bras bur 'gyur na ni de nyid dngos po yin pas dngos po med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gal te med pa zhes bya ba'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig 'bras bur 'gyur na ni de nyid dngos po yin pas dngos po med pa ma yin no //
translated: If something called ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù were the effect, then it would be an existent thing, and so it would not be nonexistent.

original: de bas na med pa byed do zhes pa ni dngos po mi byed do zhes bya ba yin pas bya ba dgag par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na med pa byed do zhes pa ni dngos po mi byed do zhes bya ba yin pas bya ba dgag par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúit makes it nonexistent‚Äù means ‚Äúit does not make it existent,‚Äù and so it would be that activity is refuted.

original: de lta na yang cung zad mi byed pa 'di ltos par bya bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang cung zad mi byed pa 'di ltos par bya bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, how could this which does not perform even the slightest function be a basis of dependence?

original: des na dngos po 'jig pa ni gzhan la ltos pa med par grub bo //
analyzed: des na dngos po 'jig pa ni gzhan la ltos pa med par grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the destruction of a thing is established as not depending on another.

original: de'i phyir / gang la 'gyur ba grub pa de //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang la 'gyur ba grub pa de //
translated: That which is established as changeable

original: ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur de las //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur de las //
translated: By nature is changeable from that.

original: gzhan la'ang ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur //
translated: Also, by nature it is changeable from another.

original: 'ga' zhig la 'gyur ba mthong ba 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la 'gyur ba mthong ba 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This seeing of change in some is by nature changeable,

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is independent.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Likewise, it is also by nature changeable from another,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gzhan dag kyang bdag nyid ji lta ba'i tshad ma dag gis @181a * //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gzhan dag kyang bdag nyid ji lta ba'i tshad ma dag gis @181a * //
translated: because there is no distinction.

original: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa grub pa kho na'i bsgrub bya go bar byed pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa grub pa kho na'i bsgrub bya go bar byed pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, other natural reasons are to be understood as proving the thesis that is to be established, only in terms of the mere nature and the relation that is just like itself.

original: dngos po'i de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni de nyid la med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni de nyid la med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin te /
translated: The nature that is the mere nature and the relation of a thing is ascertained as invariably related to that thing.

original: dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de nyid rang gi dngos su yod pa yin na /
analyzed: dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de nyid rang gi dngos su yod pa yin na /
translated: If the so-called nature that is related to mere entities were to exist in reality,

original: des yang bdag nyid bor nas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: des yang bdag nyid bor nas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
translated: then how could it exist after it has abandoned its own entity?

original: don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la ni 'bras bu gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la ni 'bras bu gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: In the case of the understanding of a different object, the effect is the logical reason,

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no error.

original: de las skyes pa ma yin pa ni mi 'khrul pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de las skyes pa ma yin pa ni mi 'khrul pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not produced from that is not nonerroneous,

original: rag ma las pa'i ngo bo rnams ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rag ma las pa'i ngo bo rnams ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because independent entities do not necessarily occur together.

original: gal te don gzhan gtan tshigs yin na 'o na de de'i chos su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te don gzhan gtan tshigs yin na 'o na de de'i chos su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the logical reason is a different object, then how could it be a property of that?

original: de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is based on that.

original: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the relation of cause and effect?

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because of that itself.

original: de lta ma yin na rten mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rten mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, the basis would not be established.

original: gal te du ba'i rten ni sa phyogs yin la /
analyzed: gal te du ba'i rten ni sa phyogs yin la /
translated: If the basis of smoke is the place,

original: rgyu ni me ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu ni me ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: is not the cause fire?üîΩThat is also smoke,

original: de yang du ba'am /
analyzed: de yang du ba'am /
translated: or it is not smoke.

original: de'i rgyu rnams kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rgyu rnams kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid do //
translated: because it is the basis of the causes of that, it is the cause.

original: gal te de las skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin na rnam pa thams cad du go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
analyzed: gal te de las skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin na rnam pa thams cad du go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
translated: If it is the effect that is understood because it arises from that, then it is the entity that is understood in every way,

original: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because that which is to be produced and the producer exist in every way.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: de med par 'byung ba ni de las skye bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par 'byung ba ni de las skye bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that which occurs in the absence of that is not ascertained to arise from that.

original: de'i phyir rgyu la rang bzhin ji snyed cig / med na mi 'byung 'bras bu ni //üîΩde dag ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu la rang bzhin ji snyed cig / med na mi 'byung 'bras bu ni // de dag ni /
translated: Therefore, the cause is that without which the effect does not occur.

original: gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Those are the reasons,

original: de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are ascertained as the effect of those.

original: gang dag de dag med na mi 'byung ba'i chos de dag kho nas yin no //
analyzed: gang dag de dag med na mi 'byung ba'i chos de dag kho nas yin no //
translated: Those are only the phenomena that do not occur in the absence of those.

original: gal te cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is argued that it follows that there is production and producer by part, that is not so.

original: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par dang rtags kyi bye brag gi khyad par can gyi spyi rnams bzung na 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par dang rtags kyi bye brag gi khyad par can gyi spyi rnams bzung na 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that a universal is that which is characterized by the particular that produces it and by the particular of the sign.

original: spyi khyad par du ma byas pa rjod par 'dod na ni 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod do //
analyzed: spyi khyad par du ma byas pa rjod par 'dod na ni 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod do //
translated: But if one wishes to express a universal without specifying it, it is not accepted, because of error.

original: gal te du ba me la mi 'khrul lo //
analyzed: gal te du ba me la mi 'khrul lo //
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúSmoke is not in error with respect to fire,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: how is that to be understood?

original: de la 'khrul na 'di /
analyzed: de la 'khrul na 'di /
translated: If there were error in that,

original: rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das 'gyur //
translated: it would be beyond having a cause.

original: de'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa las gang zhig gang dag dmigs na dmigs la /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa las gang zhig gang dag dmigs na dmigs la /
translated: From the nonapprehension of that which is its characteristic, that is, from the nonapprehension of that which is apprehended when it is apprehended,

original: de las gcig ma tshang na mi dmigs pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: de las gcig ma tshang na mi dmigs pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: and from the incompleteness of one of them, there is nonapprehension. That is its effect.

original: de yang du ba la yod do //
analyzed: de yang du ba la yod do //
translated: And that exists in smoke.

original: @181b lan cig de ltar mthong ba las kyang de de'i 'bras bur 'grub ste /
analyzed: @181b lan cig de ltar mthong ba las kyang de de'i 'bras bur 'grub ste /
translated: Even though it is seen in that way once, it is established as its effect.

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni rgyu ma yin pa las lan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni rgyu ma yin pa las lan cig kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not an effect does not occur even once from that which is not a cause.

original: gal te gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa dag la me med kyang 'byung bas 'bras bu ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa dag la me med kyang 'byung bas 'bras bu ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that fire does not exist in the rubbing sticks, etc., but arises from them, therefore it is not the effect of them.

original: ma yin te bud shing 'gyur ba'i rgyu dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par ni me yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te bud shing 'gyur ba'i rgyu dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par ni me yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because heat, which is a special kind of contact, is the cause of the transformation of fuel, and that is fire.

original: 'bras bu yang rgyu med par 'byung na ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rgyu med par 'byung na ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If an effect were to arise without a cause, it would be causeless.

original: gang zhig gang med par 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu can ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang med par 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu can ma yin no //
translated: That which arises without something else does not have that as its cause.

original: du ba yang me med par 'byung ste /
analyzed: du ba yang me med par 'byung ste /
translated: Smoke arises without fire.

original: des ni de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would not have that as its cause.

original: gal te gzhan gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not causeless because it has another cause,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the same problem arises for that.

original: de med kyang me yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang me yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Smoke arises even without that, because it arises when fire is present.

original: yang na de'am gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: yang na de'am gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: Moreover, whether it is that or something else,

original: de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: how could it arise from something that is not its nature?

original: rang gis de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni de bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gis de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni de bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not of the nature of that, it is not produced from that, and so it would be without a cause.

original: gal te de nyid 'byung ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te de nyid 'byung ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: If you say that it is not that which arises,

original: de dang 'dra ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: but something similar to it arises,

original: mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin no //
translated: how could something arise from something dissimilar?

original: de dang 'dra ba las byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba las byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it arises from something similar, it is similar.

original: gal te mi 'dra ba las kyang de dang 'dra ba 'byung na ni de dag gi nus pa ma nges pas rgyu'i tha dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtha' dag gi sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi 'dra ba las kyang de dang 'dra ba 'byung na ni de dag gi nus pa ma nges pas rgyu'i tha dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtha' dag gi sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If something similar arises from something dissimilar, then because the power of the cause is not ascertained, the difference of the cause does not make a difference, and the diversity of all things would be without a cause.

original: de la yang nyes pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la yang nyes pa bshad zin to //
translated: The error in that has already been explained.

original: thams cad thams cad las skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad las skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And everything would arise from everything.

original: de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa min pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa min pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the effect would be different or non-different from the cause.

original: de'i phyir du ba ni mthong ba'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba ni mthong ba'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, smoke does not arise from a cause that is not of the same type as what is seen,

original: rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be causeless.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Even so,

original: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
analyzed: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
translated: because it is causeless and does not depend on another,

original: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
translated: it would either always exist or never exist.üîΩThings arise sometimes,

original: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no //
translated: because they depend on conditions.

original: du ba de rgyu med pa las 'byung na ni /
analyzed: du ba de rgyu med pa las 'byung na ni /
translated: If smoke arose without a cause,

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir nam yang mi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir nam yang mi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: it would never not arise, because it would not depend on anything.

original: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dus bzhin no //
analyzed: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dus bzhin no //
translated: Because it would be complete in its arising, it would arise at all times, just as it does when it is desired.

original: yang na ni de'i tshe yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na ni de'i tshe yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or, it would not arise even at the time when it is desired,

original: med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference between the time when it does not exist and the time when it is desired.

original: dngos po ltos pa dang @182a * //
analyzed: dngos po ltos pa dang @182a * //
translated: Things arise in dependence on conditions.

original: bcas pa rnams ni res 'ga' bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bcas pa rnams ni res 'ga' bar 'gyur te /
translated: The other two are sometimes appropriate,

original: yod pa dang med pa'i dus dag na de 'byung ba rung ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i dus dag na de 'byung ba rung ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are appropriate at times when they exist and do not exist.

original: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid 'dra ba can dag ni de dang ldan pa dang yang cig shos dag tu nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid 'dra ba can dag ni de dang ldan pa dang yang cig shos dag tu nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not appropriate to determine that things that are similar in being appropriate or inappropriate with regard to place and time are endowed with one and not the other.

original: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan nam ci /
analyzed: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan nam ci /
translated: Moreover, is that appropriateness something other than the thing itself?

original: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po ni de dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po ni de dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, having abandoned some place and time, the thing that exists in other places and times is said to be dependent on them.

original: 'di ltar de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no //
translated: In this way, existence is dependent.

original: de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa ni der nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa ni der nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not appropriate to determine that it is not dependent on the benefit that they produce, because it is not appropriate to determine that it is not dependent on them.

original: de bas na yul dang dus nges pa'i phyir gang na du ba de lan cig mthong la /
analyzed: de bas na yul dang dus nges pa'i phyir gang na du ba de lan cig mthong la /
translated: Therefore, because it is determined with regard to place and time, smoke is seen in one place and not in another.

original: ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni 'di'i des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni 'di'i des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: If it is incomplete, then that which is not seen is the nature of what is generated by that.

original: gzhan du na lan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na lan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not exist even once.

original: de der nges pa yin na ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de der nges pa yin na ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: If it is determined to be that, how could it arise from another?

original: 'byung na ni du ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'byung na ni du ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If it did arise, it would not be smoke.

original: du ba ni des bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba ni des bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because smoke is a particular nature generated by that.

original: de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: In the same way, the cause is also the nature that generates that effect.

original: de gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pas lan 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pas lan 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arose from another, it would not be the nature of that, so it would not be generated even once.

original: yang na de du ba ma yin te du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na de du ba ma yin te du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, it would not be smoke, because it would arise from what is not the nature of smoke.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni de nyid me yin pas 'khrul pa med do //üîΩgal te brgya byin spyi bo me'i //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni de nyid me yin pas 'khrul pa med do // gal te brgya byin spyi bo me'i //
translated: If it were its nature, it would be fire itself, so there would be no error.

original: rang bzhin yin na de nyid me //
analyzed: rang bzhin yin na de nyid me //
translated: If the head of Indra were the nature of fire, it would be fire itself.

original: 'on te de me'i rang bzhin min //
analyzed: 'on te de me'i rang bzhin min //
translated: But if it is not the nature of fire,

original: ji ltar de las du ba 'byung //
analyzed: ji ltar de las du ba 'byung //
translated: how does smoke arise from it?

original: du ba'i rgyu yi rang bzhin me //
analyzed: du ba'i rgyu yi rang bzhin me //
translated: The nature of the cause of smoke is fire,

original: de yi nus pa'i bye brag ldan //üîΩdu ba du ba'i rgyu min las //
analyzed: de yi nus pa'i bye brag ldan // du ba du ba'i rgyu min las //
translated: because it possesses the specific power of smoke.üîΩIf smoke arose from a non-smoky cause,

original: 'byung na de ni rgyu med 'gyur //
analyzed: 'byung na de ni rgyu med 'gyur //
